Megatron Revived:
 
The clone decended.  This femme was bold, taking a chance that he wouldn't scrap her on a whim.  She definatly was a Predacon.  But she was wrong about him.  About his character and his purpose here.  His face was younger, not the middle aged face of Megatron the Tyrant, but the youthful face of Megatron before he was driven mad.
"I believe you have mistaken me for someone else," Megatron Revived said as he decended to speak with this creature.  She was beautiful.  If he wasn't looking for family right now, he would seriously concider trying to get to know this femme.
"I am not the same Megatron that tried to defeat Optimus Prime.  I would explain my origins, but it would be futile, for everyone believes the biased Autobot and later Maximal Councils.  So, make it brief.  I have little patience or time to deal with idle chit chat."

MaximaSR74@... wrote:
Endulging in that kiss... the part of her that had finally gotten use to the new form & ideal way of the Transformers... enjoyed this affection now. No longer resenting the small organic part of her. 

As the kiss was broken, she grinned & nodded. "As you wish," she purred. 

Then gracefully glided out of the chamber... heading towards the entrance where the Megatron clone was.

Shaking her head as she barely caught sight of Waspinator flying out & taking on the brunt of Megatron's cannon blast.... 

Striding out through the doors with great confidence, glancing briefly at Perceptor as she passed by him. Then returned her crimson optics to gaze upon the haunting fiure of Megatron. Her core twisted... feeling as though her loyalties were going to be tested terribly. Ever so loyal to Megatron... but if there were 2 of them, how could she be loyal to both? 

Remaining bold & confident, she spoke in a likewise voice, "Rather bold of you to return to us after all this time!" 

That fembot, feline form... slender, attractive for one of her stature... white with black stripes in some places... a mix of metal & organic... a pair of wings from her back... making her appear likened to an angel. 

She awaited Megatron's response. 
		
---------------------------------
